inputs.name: ionicCommand
inputs.label: Command
inputs.helpMarkDown: Ionic command to run. Ex: "platform add android"

inputs.name: ionicArgs
inputs.label: Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Arguments that should be used for the command.

inputs.name: ionicVersion
inputs.label: Ionic Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version of Ionic tools to use to run the command If not specified, uses a version specified in the IONIC_DEFAULT_VERSION env var and falls back to the latest version.

inputs.name: cordovaVersion
inputs.label: Cordova Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version of Cordova tools to use to run the command. If not specified, looks at taco.json, the CORDOVA_DEFAULT_VERSION env var, and finally falls back to the latest version.

inputs.name: cwd
inputs.label: Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Working directory for command runs. Defaults to the root of the repository.
